long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SustEarn: Revolutionize Your Browsing Experience with Sustainability and Rewards!

Welcome to SustEarn, the innovative Chrome extension that transforms your internet browsing into a journey of environmental awareness and rewards. With SustEarn, track your carbon footprint in real-time, earn coins for eco-friendly web surfing, and redeem them for fantastic offers. Plus, connect with a community of like-minded users right from your browser!

Key Features:

Track Your Carbon Footprint: SustEarn offers a unique feature that calculates CO2 emissions based on your browsing habits. Stay informed about your environmental impact with detailed stats and tips to improve your carbon footprint.
Earn Eco-Coins: Get rewarded for sustainable browsing! Earn coins for minimizing CO2 emissions, which can be accumulated and redeemed for a variety of exciting offers and discounts from eco-friendly brands.
Redeem Exciting Offers: Your eco-coins are more than just points ‚Äì they're a currency for sustainability. Redeem them for exclusive deals, discounts, and offers from our wide range of partner brands committed to environmental sustainability.
Community Chat Feature: Engage with a community of eco-conscious individuals. Share tips, discuss sustainability, and connect with users who share your passion for the environment through our in-built chat feature.
User-Friendly Dashboard: Experience a sleek, intuitive dashboard that offers quick access to your carbon footprint stats, coin balance, and a marketplace for offer redemption.
Privacy-Focused: We respect your privacy. SustEarn operates with minimal data usage and ensures that your browsing data remains confidential.

Privacy policy : https://slae.app/privacy-policy/
Regular Updates & Tips: Receive regular updates on how to reduce your digital carbon footprint and learn more about sustainable living.
How It Works:

Install the SustEarn extension with just a click.
Browse the internet as usual. SustEarn calculates your CO2 emissions in the background.
Earn coins based on your sustainable browsing habits.
Redeem your coins for offers, or chat with fellow eco-minded users.
SustEarn is more than just an extension; it's a community, a reward system, and a step towards a greener planet. Join us in making a difference, one click at a time!

Note: The extension is free to use, but some offers and rewards might be subject to terms and conditions by partner brands.

Support & Feedback:

Got questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you! Contact us at support@slae.app

Join the SustEarn community today and turn your browsing into a force for good! üåçüíöüå±
